bench

Class Client

  • java.lang.Object
    • bench.Client
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class Client
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable
    Run test threads to model individual SQL client connections. This module manages the actual transaction logic and txn performance counters.
    Author:
    dhentchel

      • getStats

        public TestContext.TestStats getStats()

      • load

        public void load()
        Perform initial schema creation and database load.

      • run

        public void run()
        Benchmark driver for each client thread. Threads used the shared runFlag to synchronize start and stop. The client repeatedly invokes a prepared statement for a table INSERT, committing after each insert. Each client thread generates unique random data for the contents of the insert, and tracks successful and failed transactions.
        Specified by:
        run in interface java.lang.Runnable

      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
        Parameters:
        args -
